home.title: Home - Cristian Arando | Software Developer Portfolio
home.description: Welcome! I am Cristian Arando, Systems Engineer with a postgraduate diploma in Information Security for physical and virtual environments. Explore my portfolio focused on cybersecurity and software development.

hero.description: Strategist passionate about solving complex problems with technology

about.title: About Me
about.paragraph1: Strategist dedicated to turning ambitious ideas into reality through technology. My approach blends analytical thinking and innovation to solve complex problems and deliver solutions that stand out.
about.paragraph2: My expertise centers on modern web development with Next.js, React, NestJS, Express, and TypeScript. I enjoy exploring where technology meets reality, and I'm passionate about gaming and philosophical books, always seeking new ways to expand my perspective and skills.
about.paragraph3: Based in Cochabamba, Bolivia, I bring a unique perspective to every project, always striving to create solutions that are both meaningful and impactful. I believe in continuous learning and drawing inspiration from diverse interests to fuel my work.
